location: 4866 W Pico Blvd., Los Angeles, CA 90019.
description: Roderick Sykes assisted by James Anderson, Leneon Guest, Carlos Rittner, and Diondre Wilson. Three faces-an African American, an Asian American and a Latino celebrating the diversity of Los Angeles. The mural also emphasizes the importance of literacy, creativity, and the community. Sponsored and commissioned by SPARC. Photo © SPARC.
